mapper.sql: SELECT res.id as id, res.tipo as tipo, res.estado as estado, fecha_solicitud, usuario, recurso as recurso_id, rec.nombre as recurso_nombre, rec.ubicacion as recurso_ubicacion, rec.tipo as recurso_tipo, rec.capacidad as recurso_capacidad, rec.estado as recurso_estado, rec.inicio_disponibilidad as recurso_inicio_disponibilidad, rec.fin_disponibilidad as recurso_fin_disponibilidad, usu.correo as usuario_correo, usu.u_area as usuario_u_area, usu.nombre as usuario_nombre, eve.id as evento_id, eve.estado as evento_estado, eve.hora_inicio as evento_hora_inicio, eve.hora_fin as evento_hora_fin FROM reserva as res, recurso as rec, usuario as usu, evento as eve WHERE res.recurso=rec.id AND usu.correo=res.usuario AND eve.reserva=res.id

select.if: AND res.estado='Activa' AND res.recurso=#{id} AND EXISTS(select * from evento as eve1 where now() <= eve1.hora_inicio and res.id=eve1.reserva);

mapper.update: update reserva as res set estado='Cancelada' WHERE res.recurso=#{id} AND res.estado='Activa' AND EXISTS(select * from evento as eve1 where now() <= eve1.hora_inicio and res.id=eve1.reserva);
mapper.select: SELECT fecha_inicio, fecha_fin FROM semestre WHERE fecha_inicio <= now() AND now() <= fecha_fin LIMIT 1;
